detail: At SimplyGiving, weâ€™re inspired by the power of the Internet to do good. We provide an incredible way for anyone to fundraise for their favourite charity or a personal need. Here at SimplyGiving we provide you with the right online tools and support to help you as a charity, NGO or as an individual in need to reach more people and fund your campaign.
name: Simply Giving

detail: Giving Hub is an intiative from NGOHub which aims to make charitable giving easy, support changemakers to fundraise for a cause and ensure charitable giving is accountable and impactful by verifying charities.
name: Giving Hub

detail: Teachers are the backbone of our education system. We empower teachers to provide the best learning experience for their students, by removing the barriers that teachers face in obtaining resources and support to do what they do best - teach.
name: 100% Project

detail: At GIVE.asia, we believe in harnessing human compassion and kindness for people in need. GIVE.asia helps patients with hospital bills and enables children to study in rural areas. GIVE.asia helps event organisers raise funds for causes. GIVE.asia provides support for humanitarian effort for countries in need.
name: GIVE.asia

detail: Airfunding is a global donation-type crowdfunding service. Anyone in any country can quickly and easily create projects to raise funds around the world for their beloved ones, for themselves, for the community and for charity.
name: Airfunding
